summary: Provides a ready‑to‑use end‑to‑end pipeline that combines the components of the Kandinsky V2.2 model to generate images from textual prompts, handling model loading, configuration parsing, and inference in a single interface.
business_intent: Allow developers and content creators to quickly integrate state‑of‑the‑art text‑to‑image generation into applications for marketing, design, entertainment, or any scenario that benefits from AI‑driven visual content.
